overview.role_description:
1. Aero Rover is an Aero sub DPS, healer or Support, with a focus on Resonance Skill DMG.
2. Aero Rover's enhanced Mid-air Attack and Resonance Liberation provide team-wide healing.
3. As a core enabler of Aero Negative Status, Aero Rover’s Resonance Skill converts all non-Aero Negative Statuses into Aero.
4. Aero Rover's Outro Skill raises the target’s Aero Negative Status stack cap when allies attack.
5. Aero Rover has a 5-star signature weapon that boosts team-wide Aero DMG after triggering its passive.
overview.synopsis:
1. Tip: Charge [Windstrings] via Intro Skill/enhanced Mid-air Attacks/3rd–4th hits of Basic Attack, then unleash 2 stages of ultimate Resonance Skill to trigger weapon passive for teamwide Aero DMG boost. Follow with Resonance Liberation, then switch out at full Concerto Energy.
2. Rotation: EAA-EAA-EAA-EER.
3. Team Comp: The most suitable role is Support in Jiyan team. The team setup of Jiyan + Mortefi + Aero Rover works well. Please refer to the full guide for team rotation.
overview.rotation:

2. Rotation: EAA-EAA-EAA-EER.
3. Team Comp: The most suitable role is Support in Jiyan team. The team setup of Jiyan + Mortefi + Aero Rover works well. Please refer to the full guide for team rotation.

texts.name: Bloodpact's Pledge
texts.effectDescription: Providing Healing increases Resonance Skill DMG by (10%/14%/18%/22%/26%) for (6/6/6/6/6)s. When Rover: Aero casts Resonance Skill Unbound Flow, Aero DMG dealt by nearby Resonators on the field is Amplified by (10%/14%/18%/22%/26%) for (30/30/30/30/30)s.

texts.name: Blazing Brilliance
texts.effectDescription: ATK increased by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). The wielder gains 1 stack of Searing Feather upon dealing damage, which can be triggered once every 0.5s, and gains 5 stacks of the same effect upon casting Resonance Skill. Each stack of Searing Feather gives (4%/5%/6%/7%/8%) additional Resonance Skill DMG Bonus for up to 14 stacks. After reaching the max stacks, all stacks will be removed in (12/12/12/12/12)s.

texts.name: Emerald of Genesis
texts.effectDescription: Increases Energy Regen by (12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%). When Resonance Skill is cast, increases ATK by (6%/7.5%/9%/10.5%/12%), stacking up to (2/2/2/2/2) time(s). This effect lasts for (10/10/10/10/10)s.

texts.name: Reminiscence: Fleurdelys
texts.skillDescription:
Summon the Windcleaver to attack the target, dealing 27.36% Aero DMG 8 times and 136.80% Aero DMG once.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 10.00% Aero DMG Bonus. If this Resonator is Rover: Aero or ???, grant another 10.00% Aero DMG Bonus.

CD: 20s.

texts.name: Gusts of Welkin
texts.description: Aero DMG + 10%

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Healing Bonus + 10%.

texts.name: Bell-Borne Geochelone
texts.skillDescription:
Activate the protection of Bell-Borne Geochelone. Deal Glacio DMG based on 145.92% of the current character's DEF to nearby enemies, and obtain a Bell-Borne Shield that lasts for 15s



The Bell-Borne Shield provides 50.00% DMG Reduction and 10.00% DMG Boost for the current team members, and disappears after the current character is hit for 3 times.



CD: 20s

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Increases the ATK of all party members by 15% for 30s upon healing allies.

texts.name: Rejuvenating Glow
texts.description: Healing Bonus + 10%.

texts.name: Verdant Summit
texts.effectDescription: Increases Attribute DMG Bonus by (12%/15%/18%/21%/24%). Every time Intro Skill or Resonance Liberation is cast, increases Heavy Attack DMG Bonus by (24%/30%/36%/42%/48%), stacking up to (2/2/2/2/2) time(s). This effect lasts for (14/14/14/14/14)s.

texts.name: Nightmare: Feilian Beringal
texts.skillDescription:
Summon a Nightmare: Feilian Beringal to attack enemies, dealing 164.16% Aero DMG. The remaining Whirlwind Beam will continuously attack surrounding enemies up to 5 times, each dealing 21.89% Aero DMG.

The Resonator with this Echo equipped in their main slot gains 12.00% Aero DMG Bonus and 12.00% Heavy Attack DMG Bonus.

CD: 20s.

texts.name: Sierra Gale
texts.description: Aero DMG + 30% for 15s after releasing Intro Skill.

texts.name: Static Mist
texts.effectDescription: Increases Energy Regen by (12.8%/16%/19.2%/22.4%/25.6%). Incoming Resonator's ATK is increased by (10%/12.5%/15%/17.5%/20%) for (14/14/14/14/14)s, stackable for up to (1/1/1/1/1) times after the wielder casts Outro Skill.

texts.name: Impermanence Heron
texts.skillDescription:
Transform into Impermanence Heron to fly up and smack down, dealing 310.56% Havoc DMG.



Long press to stay as Impermanence Heron and continuously spit flames, each attack dealing 55.73% Havoc DMG.



Once the initial attack lands on any enemy, the current character regains 10 Resonance Energy. If the current character uses their Outro Skill within the next 15s, the next character's damage dealt will be boosted by 12% for 15s.



CD: 20s

texts.name: Moonlit Clouds
texts.description: Upon using Outro Skill, increases the ATK of the next Resonator by 22.5% for 15s.

texts.name: Sand in the Storm
texts.description: Casting Intro Skill Relentless Squall increases ATK by 20% for 10s.

texts.name: Boundless Winds
texts.description: Increase Healing from Resonance Liberation Omega Storm by 20%.

texts.name: Storm's Echo
texts.description:
Grant Aeolian Realm to all nearby Resonators in the team for 30s. Aeolian Realm effect:

- Upon hitting a target, increase the maximum stack of Aero Erosion the target can receive by 3 for 10s. This effect is not stackable.

texts.name: Wind Cutter
texts.description:
Basic Attack

Perform up to 4 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG.



Heavy Attack

Consume STA to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

- {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after casting the skill to perform Basic Attack Stage 3 directly.



Heavy Attack - Razor Wind

Hold Normal Attack after casting Basic Attack Stage 3, Dodge Counter, or Heavy Attack to cast Heavy Attack Razor Wind. Consume STA to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.



Mid-air Attack

Consume STA to perform Plunging Attack, dealing Aero DMG.

- {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack shortly after landing to cast Basic Attack Stage 4.

- At max Windstrings, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Normal Attack shortly after landing to cast Resonance Skill Unbound Flow.



Dodge Counter

{Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Aero DMG.

texts.name: Illusion Breaker
texts.description:
Awakening Gale

Jump up into the mid-air and slash the target, dealing Aero DMG.



Skyfall Severance

While in mid-air, {Cus:Ipt,Touch=tap PC=press Gamepad=press} Resonance Skill to deal Aero DMG, which removes all stacks of Spectro Frazzle, Havoc Bane, Fusion Burst, Glacio Chafe, and Electro Flare from the target hit and inflicts 1 stack of Aero Erosion for each stack removed.

texts.name: Cycle of Wind
texts.description:
Mid-air Attack - Cloudburst Dance

Perform up to 2 consecutive attacks, dealing Aero DMG (considered Resonance Skill DMG) and healing all nearby Resonators in the team. Cast through the following 3 ways:

- {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after casting Resonance Skill Awakening Gale.

- {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after casting Intro Skill.

- {Cus:Ipt,Touch=Tap PC=Press Gamepad=Press} Normal Attack right after casting Heavy Attack Razor Wind.

When casting Mid-air Attack Cloudburst Dance, hold Normal Attack to perform Mid-air Attack.



Resonance Skill - Unbound Flow

At max Windstrings, Resonance Skill Awakening Gale becomes Resonance Skill Unbound Flow: Perform up to 2 consecutive attacks. Each attack consumes 60 Windstrings, dealing Aero DMG, considered Resonance Skill DMG.

Switching to another Resonator after Stage 1 automatically triggers Stage 2 of this skill. 



Windstring

Rover can hold up to 120 Windstrings.

Each stage of Mid-air Attack Cloudburst Dance restores 25 Windstrings on hit.

Casting Intro Skill restores 20 Windstrings.

Hitting a target with Basic Attack Stage 3 or 4 or Dodge Counter restores 10 Windstrings.

texts.name: Omega Storm
texts.description:
Unleash the power of the Eye of Tempest, dealing Aero DMG and healing all nearby Resonators in the team.

Can be cast in mid-air close to the ground.

texts.name: Relentless Squall
texts.description: Deal Aero DMG.

texts.description:

Switching to another Resonator after Stage 1 automatically triggers Stage 2 of this skill.

Hitting a target with Basic Attack Stage 3 or 4 or Dodge Counter restores 10 Windstrings.

texts.name: Relentless Squall
texts.description: Deal Aero DMG.

texts.name: Storm Subsides in the Void
texts.description: Casting Mid-air Attack Cloudburst Dance enhances Rover's resistance to interruption for 3s.

texts.name: Glimmers Fade into the Dark
texts.description: Casting Resonance Skill Unbound Flow continuously restores HP for the Resonator on the field by 20% of Rover's ATK every 3s for 30s. When the Resonator on the field has an HP lower than 35%, immediately restore 10% of their lost HP. This restoration effect can be triggered once every 10s and will not be affected by any Healing Bonus.

texts.name: Illusions Collapse in a Grip
texts.description: Aero DMG Bonus is increased by 15%.

texts.name: Boundaries Shatter in an Instant
texts.description: Casting Mid-air Attack Cloudburst Dance increases Resonance Skill DMG Bonus by 15% for 5s.

texts.name: Life and Death Intertwine
texts.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Liberation Omega Storm is increased by 20%.

texts.name: All Crumble in the Wind
texts.description: The DMG Multiplier of Resonance Skill Unbound Flow is increased by 30%.
